sense.gloss: the die is cast, there is no going back, point of no return, alea iacta est, alea jacta est
small cube (esp. of food), die, dice
thief who steals money from the offerings box at a shrine or temple, offerings thief

sdata.j: はい、お↑賽銭↑↓さいせん↓・・・１０↑円↑↓えん↓ずつね。はい、↑美羽↑↓みわ↓ちゃん。
sdata.e: OK, here's the donation ... 10 yen each. Here you go, Mihane.

sdata.j: 「これは↑何↑↓なに↓？↑供物↑↓くもつ↓か？」「そうだよ、このお↑賽銭↑↓さいせん↓↑箱↑↓ばこ↓の↑中↑↓なか↓に↑入↑↓い↓れて・・・この↑紐↑↓ひも↓を↑引↑↓ひ↓っ↑張↑↓ぱ↓るの」
sdata.e: What is this? An offering? "That's right. Put it in this offertory box ... and pull this rope."

sdata.j: だがすでに、↑賽↑↓さい↓は↑投↑↓な↓げられた。
sdata.e: However, the die had already been cast.
In for a penny, in for a pound.
